TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement/ExplorerBar/NormalGroupBackground extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides a for the background of a common group of items in the Explorer Bar. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ExplorerBar.NormalGroupBackground.Normal%2A> property of the VisualStyleElement.ExplorerBar.NormalGroupBackground class gets a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> that represents the background of a common group of items in the Explorer Bar, such as the **File and Folder Tasks** group in Windows Explorer.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ExplorerBar.NormalGroupBackground.Normal%2A> property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementExplorerBarNormalGroupBackground1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#150](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/e8caec0b-5c23-4942-8b5d-_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#150](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/e8caec0b-5c23-4942-8b5d-_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents the background of a common group of items in the Explorer Bar.
Docs.value: A that represents the background of a common group of items in the Explorer Bar.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Normal property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Normal property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementExplorerBarNormalGroupBackground1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#150](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/64dc5ccf-4db2-4998-8ac7-_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#150](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/64dc5ccf-4db2-4998-8ac7-_1.vb)]
